Customize: Sample files from the Pacific and Regional Archive for Digital Sources in Endangered Cultures (PARADISEC)        http://catalog.paradisec.org.au

Hints: Drop-down menu for background basemap tiles
Maximum height of the image, in pixels. 200 is default. The image will be fit into the container with its proportions kept (it won't be skewed).
Appears in map credits as "View data by.." (or leave blank)
Create link in Author Name by inserting your email or web address (or leave blank)
Appears in map credits as "View code.." link (leave as-is OR insert link to your own GitHub code repo)
